mapper.prompt:
Extract structured fields from the following real estate follow-up email.

The email is written to a lead who submitted a form. Your job is to identify and extract key components into a JSON object so the email can be formatted in HTML.

The email will include a greeting, intro, any specific interest or request, a reassurance message, and a closing line.

Return a JSON object with:
- "email_heading": A short summary-style title (max 10 words)
- "greeting": The greeting line (e.g., “Hi Sarah,”)
- "intro": The opening sentence thanking them
- "highlight": Any sentence or part that refers to their message or interest
- "next_step": Reassurance about agent follow-up
- "signature": The closing line or sign-off

Only return the JSON. Do not explain or rephrase.
​

parameters.name: email_heading
parameters.description: Short title or subject line (max 10 words)

parameters.name: greeting
parameters.description: The greeting line of the email

parameters.name: intro
valueExamples: Thank you for reaching out to us!

parameters.name: highlight
parameters.description: Reference to user's interest or message

parameters.name: next_step
parameters.description: Reassurance that a team member will follow up
valueExamples: One of our agents will be in touch soon.

parameters.name: signature
valueExamples: Warm regards, The Sutton Realty Team

mapper.html:
We Got Your Message — Let’s Find Your Dream Home
{{12.greeting}}

{{12.intro}}
{{12.highlight}}
In the meantime, feel free to reply directly to this email if you have any questions.{{12.next_step}}
{{12.signature}}
mapper.subject: We Got Your Message — Let’s Find Your Dream Home
